================================================.TextFieldossed To: Government of Canada

Industry Engagement Session: Construction Management Services
------------------------------------------------

**Event Title:** Industry Engagement Session – Construction Management Services

### Important Details
- **Reference Number**: WS4207661360-Doc4207707925
- **Tender Status**: Expired
- **Publication Date**: September 11, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date**: September 20, 2023 (14:00:00)

### Event Description
This is a Request for Information (RFI) to engage with industry stakeholders for Construction Management Services.

### Event Details

- **Event Period**: Pre-registration is required by September 20, 2023, at 4 PM EST. Requests received after this date will not be acknowledged.
- **Pre-registration**: RSVP required. Please contact Zobia Essa (TPSGC/PSPC) for instructions.
- **Contact Information**: Zobia Essa, essa.zobia@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Contracting Entity Information

- **Contracting Entity Name**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5 Canada

### Business Requirements and Related Categories

- **Procurement Category**: Construction and Infrastructure
- **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- **Regions**: Ontario (except National Capital Region)

### Important Links

- **RFx**: Discover [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17415530?extsite=MTc0MTU1MzBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17415530?extsite=MTc0MTU1MzBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

Please note that this event is expired. We produce this notice solely for archival purposes. Please use this as a publicly available reference for studying successful event posting practices.
